mapper.update:
update res_render_pic
business_id = #{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pic_code = #{picCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_task_pic_id = #{sysTaskPicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pic_name = #{picName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic_file_name = #{picFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic_type = #{picType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic_size = #{picSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pic_weight = #{picWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pic_high = #{picHigh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pic_suffix = #{picSuffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic_level = #{picLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pic_format = #{picFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic_path = #{picPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic_desc = #{picDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic_ordering = #{picOrdering,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_key = #{fileKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_keys = #{fileKeys,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, small_pic_info = #{smallPicInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, view_point = #{viewPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, scene = #{scene,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rendering_type = #{renderingType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sequence = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pano_path = #{panoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_create_time = #{taskCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sys_code = #{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, att1 = #{att1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, att2 = #{att2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, numa1 = #{numa1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, numa2 = #{numa2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pano_level = #{panoLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, roam = #{roam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, design_scene_id = #{designSceneId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, source_plan_id = #{sourcePlanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, source_template_id = #{templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, plan_recommended_id = #{planRecommendedId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sys_task_pic_id = #{sysTaskPicId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(count(1),0) FROM res_render_pic WHERE sys_task_pic_id = #{sysTaskPicId} AND is_deleted=0 AND file_key in ("design.designPlanRecommended.render.roam","design.designPlan.render.roam.pic")

select
from res_render_pic where 1=1 and file_key = 'design.designPlan.render.small.pic' and pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update res_render_pic set is_deleted = 1 where design_scene_id = #{sceneId}
UPDATE res_render_pic SET design_scene_id=#{designSceneId} WHERE id=#{pid}
mapper.select: SELECT sys_task_pic_id sysTaskPicId FROM res_render_pic WHERE id =#{smallId}
mapper.update: UPDATE res_render_pic SET design_scene_id = #{sceneId} WHERE sys_task_pic_id=#{taskId} AND sys_task_pic_id > 0
mapper.select: SELECT sys_code sysCode FROM res_render_pic WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT B.uuid FROM (SELECT id FROM res_render_pic WHERE id=#{id} ) A INNER JOIN design_render_roam B ON A.id=B.screen_shot_id;
mapper.update: update res_render_pic set is_deleted = 1 where plan_recommended_id = #{planRecommendedId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT id AS thumbId FROM res_render_pic WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND rendering_type = 4 AND file_key = 'design.designPlan.render.small.pic' AND design_scene_id = #{sceneId}

SELECT B.pic_path AS smallPicPath, C.pic_path AS screenPicPath, B.plan_name AS sceneName FROM ( SELECT A.sys_task_pic_id, A.pic_path, E.plan_name FROM res_render_pic A INNER JOIN res_render_pic_group_ref D ON A.id = D.thumbId LEFT JOIN design_plan_render_scene E ON A.design_scene_id = E.id WHERE D.gid = #{gid} ) B LEFT JOIN res_render_pic C ON C.id = B.sys_task_pic_id

select
from auto_render_res_render_pic where 1=1 and file_key = 'design.designPlan.render.small.pic' and pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
